trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Financial" name="Financial" href=""></xref> module contains procedures used to perform financial operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Financial" name="Financial" href=""> </xref>模块包含用于执行财务操作的过程。

trans-unit.source: This module supports the Visual Basic run-time library members that perform financial calculations such as depreciation, present and future values, interest rates, rates of return, and payments.
trans-unit.target: 此模块支持执行如折旧、 现在和将来的值、 利率、 返回时，和付款的比率的财务计算的 Visual Basic 运行时库成员。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the depreciation of an asset for a specific time period using the double-declining balance method or some other method you specify.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定特定时间段内使用双倍余额递减平衡方法或某些其他方法来指定的资产折旧。

trans-unit.source: The double-declining balance method computes depreciation at an accelerated rate.
trans-unit.target: 双倍余额递减平衡方法来计算折旧以加速的速率。

trans-unit.source: Depreciation is highest in the first period and decreases in successive periods.
trans-unit.target: 折旧是第一个时间段内最高和后续周期中会降低。

trans-unit.source: The `Life` and `Period` arguments must be expressed in the same units.
trans-unit.target: `Life`和`Period`自变量必须以相同的单位表示。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `Life` is given in months, `Period` must also be given in months.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`Life`在月中，给定`Period`还必须为其提供在月中。

trans-unit.source: All arguments must be positive numbers.
trans-unit.target: 所有参数必须都是正数。

trans-unit.source: The `DDB` function uses the following formula to calculate depreciation for a given period: Depreciation / Period = ((Cost – Salvage) * Factor) / Life
trans-unit.target: `DDB`函数使用以下公式计算的一段给定时间折旧︰ 折旧 / 段 = ((Cost – Salvage) * 因素) / 生命

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying initial cost of the asset.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定资产的初始的成本。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying value of the asset at the end of its useful life.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定在其使用年限末尾资产值。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying length of useful life of the asset.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定的资产的使用年限的长度。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying period for which asset depreciation is calculated.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定计算资产折旧的时期。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying rate at which the balance declines.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定从该处余额递减的速率。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, 2 (double-declining method) is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，则假定 2 （双倍余额递减法）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the depreciation of an asset for a specific time period using the double-declining balance method or some other method you specify.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定特定时间段内使用双倍余额递减平衡方法或某些其他方法来指定的资产折旧。

trans-unit.source: Factor <= 0, Salvage < 0, Period <= 0, or Period > Life.
trans-unit.target: Factor<= 0, Salvage < 0, Period <= 0, or Period >Life.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the future value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定未来年金值基于定期固定付款和固定的利率。

trans-unit.source: An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over time.
trans-unit.target: 年金是一系列段时间内所做的固定数量现金付款。

trans-unit.source: An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan).
trans-unit.target: 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或 （如每月节省计划） 投资。

trans-unit.source: The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units.
trans-unit.target: `Rate`和`NPer`必须使用以相同的单位表示的付款周期计算自变量。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`Rate`使用月计算`NPer`还必须按月进行计算。

trans-unit.source: For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers.
trans-unit.target: （如存款） 中支付的现金表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying interest rate per period.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定每个周期的利率。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你获得的汽车贷款年增长率百分比 (APR) 的 10%，并使每月付款，每个周期的速率为 0.1/12，即 0.0083。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying total number of payment periods in the annuity.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定年金的付款周期总数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你在四年的汽车贷款上进行每月付款，你的贷款了的 4 x 12 （即 48） 付款周期。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying payment to be made each period.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定进行每个段内的付款。

trans-unit.source: Payments usually contain principal and interest that doesn't change over the life of the annuity.
trans-unit.target: 付款通常包含主体和利息，都不会更改年金的生命周期。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying present value (or lump sum) of a series of future payments.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定一系列将来付款存在的值 （即总额）。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当您贷款钱购买一辆汽车，贷款量是到您每月付款 lender 的现值。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, 0 is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，则假定为 0。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: Object of type <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"></xref> that specifies when payments are due.
trans-unit.target: 类型的对象<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"> </xref> ，指定何时付款。

trans-unit.source: This argument must be either <xref uid="langword_csharp_DueDate.EndOfPeriod" name="DueDate.EndOfPeriod" href=""></xref> if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_DueDate.BegOfPeriod" name="DueDate.BegOfPeriod" href=""></xref> if payments are due at the beginning of the period.
trans-unit.target: 此参数必须是<xref uid="langword_csharp_DueDate.EndOfPeriod" name="DueDate.EndOfPeriod" href=""></xref>如果付款的付款周期，末尾的到期时间或<xref uid="langword_csharp_DueDate.BegOfPeriod" name="DueDate.BegOfPeriod" href=""></xref>如果在该期间开始付款的到期时间。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, <xref uid="langword_csharp_DueDate.EndOfPeriod" name="DueDate.EndOfPeriod" href=""></xref> is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略， <xref uid="langword_csharp_DueDate.EndOfPeriod" name="DueDate.EndOfPeriod" href=""> </xref>假定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the future value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定未来年金值基于定期固定付款和固定的利率。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the interest payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>基于定期固定付款和固定的利率指定年金的给定期间利率付款。

trans-unit.source: An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over time.
trans-unit.target: 年金是一系列段时间内所做的固定数量现金付款。

trans-unit.source: An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan).
trans-unit.target: 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或 （如每月节省计划） 投资。

trans-unit.source: The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units.
trans-unit.target: `Rate`和`NPer`必须使用以相同的单位表示的付款周期计算自变量。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`Rate`使用月计算`NPer`还必须按月进行计算。

trans-unit.source: For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers.
trans-unit.target: （如存款） 中支付的现金表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying interest rate per period.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定每个周期的利率。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你获得的汽车贷款年增长率百分比 (APR) 的 10%，并使每月付款，每个周期的速率为 0.1/12，即 0.0083。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying payment period in the range 1 through `NPer`.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定到 1 范围内的付款周期`NPer`。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying total number of payment periods in the annuity.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定年金的付款周期总数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你在四年的汽车贷款上进行每月付款，你的贷款了的 4 x 12 （即 48） 付款周期。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying present value, or value today, of a series of future payments or receipts.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定存在值，或当前，值的一系列的未来付款或回执。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当您贷款钱购买一辆汽车，贷款量是到您每月付款 lender 的现值。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying future value or cash balance you want after you've made the final payment.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定将来的值或你希望之后所做的最后一次付款的现金余额。

trans-unit.source: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that's its value after the final payment.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一笔贷款将来的值是 $0，因为最终付款之后，所以其值。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要保存你的孩子教育版大于 18 岁的 50000，则 50000 是将来的值。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, 0 is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，则假定为 0。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: Object of type <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"></xref> that specifies when payments are due.
trans-unit.target: 类型的对象<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"> </xref> ，指定何时付款。

trans-unit.source: This argument must be either `DueDate.EndOfPeriod` if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or `DueDate.BegOfPeriod` if payments are due at the beginning of the period.
trans-unit.target: 此参数必须是`DueDate.EndOfPeriod`如果付款的付款周期，末尾的到期时间或`DueDate.BegOfPeriod`如果在该期间开始付款的到期时间。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, `DueDate.EndOfPeriod` is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，`DueDate.EndOfPeriod`假定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the interest payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>基于定期固定付款和固定的利率指定年金的给定期间利率付款。

trans-unit.source: Per <= 0 or Per > NPer
trans-unit.target: Per<= 0 or Per >NPer

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定一系列定期现金流量 （付款和收款） 的内部收益率。

trans-unit.source: The internal rate of return is the interest rate received for an investment consisting of payments and receipts that occur at regular intervals.
trans-unit.target: 返回的内部收益率是收到组成付款和收款定期进行投资的兴趣速率。

trans-unit.source: The `IRR` function uses the order of values within the array to interpret the order of payments and receipts.
trans-unit.target: `IRR`函数使用在该数组中的值的顺序来解释付款和收款的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to enter your payment and receipt values in the correct sequence.
trans-unit.target: 请确保以正确的顺序输入付款和回执值。

trans-unit.source: The cash flow for each period does not need to be fixed, as it is for an annuity.
trans-unit.target: 每个段内现金流量不必固定的、 按原样年金。

trans-unit.source: `IRR` is calculated by iteration.
trans-unit.target: `IRR`通过迭代计算。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the value of `Guess`, `IRR` cycles through the calculation until the result is accurate to within 0.00001 percent.
trans-unit.target: 从的值开始`Guess`，`IRR`进行计算，直到结果是精确到 0.00001%范围内的周期。

trans-unit.source: If `IRR` cannot find a result after 20 tries, it fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果`IRR`找不到 20 后的结果尝试，它将失败。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying cash flow values.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定现金流量值。

trans-unit.source: The array must contain at least one negative value (a payment) and one positive value (a receipt).
trans-unit.target: 该数组必须包含至少一个负值 （支出） 和一个正值 （接收）。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: Object specifying value you estimate will be returned by <xref uid="langword_csharp_IRR" name="IRR" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将返回对象，它指定估算的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_IRR" name="IRR" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, `Guess` is 0.1 (10 percent).
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，`Guess`为 0.1 （10%)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定一系列定期现金流量 （付款和收款） 的内部收益率。

trans-unit.source: Array argument values are invalid or Guess <= -1.
trans-unit.target: 数组自变量值均无效或 Guess <=-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the modified internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定一系列定期现金流量 （付款和收款） 的已修改内部收益率。

trans-unit.source: The modified internal rate of return is the internal rate of return when payments and receipts are financed at different rates.
trans-unit.target: 已修改的内部收益率时付款和收款利率时不同的速率的内部收益率。

trans-unit.source: The `MIRR` function takes into account both the cost of the investment (`FinanceRate`) and the interest rate received on reinvestment of cash (`ReinvestRate`).
trans-unit.target: `MIRR`函数将考虑在内的投资成本 (`FinanceRate`) 和中得到的现金利率的利率 (`ReinvestRate`)。

trans-unit.source: The `FinanceRate` and `ReinvestRatearguments` are percentages expressed as decimal values.
trans-unit.target: `FinanceRate`和`ReinvestRatearguments`是表示为十进制值的百分比。

trans-unit.source: For example, 12 percent is expressed as 0.12.
The `MIRR` function uses the order of values within the array to interpret the order of payments and receipts.
trans-unit.target: `MIRR`函数使用在该数组中的值的顺序来解释付款和收款的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to enter your payment and receipt values in the correct sequence.
trans-unit.target: 请确保以正确的顺序输入付款和回执值。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying cash-flow values.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定现金流量值。

trans-unit.source: The array must contain at least one negative value (a payment) and one positive value (a receipt).
trans-unit.target: 该数组必须包含至少一个负值 （支出） 和一个正值 （接收）。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying interest rate paid as the cost of financing.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定利率付费作为金融的成本。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying interest rate received on gains from cash reinvestment.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定从现金利息所得收益的利率。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the modified internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定一系列定期现金流量 （付款和收款） 的已修改内部收益率。

trans-unit.source: Rank of ValueArray does not equal 1, FinanceRate = -1, or ReinvestRate = -1
trans-unit.target: Rank of ValueArray does not equal 1, FinanceRate = -1, or ReinvestRate = -1

trans-unit.source: Division by zero has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 出现被零除。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the number of periods for an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>基于定期固定的付款和固定的利率指定年金的期间数。

trans-unit.source: An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time.
trans-unit.target: 年金是一系列段一段时间内所做的固定数量现金付款。

trans-unit.source: An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan).
trans-unit.target: 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或 （如每月节省计划） 投资。

trans-unit.source: For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers.
trans-unit.target: （如存款） 中支付的现金表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying interest rate per period.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定每个周期的利率。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你获得的汽车贷款年增长率百分比 (APR) 的 10%，并使每月付款，每个周期的速率为 0.1/12，即 0.0083。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying payment to be made each period.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定进行每个段内的付款。

trans-unit.source: Payments usually contain principal and interest that does not change over the life of the annuity.
trans-unit.target: 付款通常包含主体和利息，都不会更改年金的生命周期。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying present value, or value today, of a series of future payments or receipts.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定存在值，或当前，值的一系列的未来付款或回执。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当您贷款钱购买一辆汽车，贷款量是到您每月付款 lender 的现值。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying future value or cash balance you want after you have made the final payment.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定将来的值或你希望之后所做的最后一次付款的现金余额。

trans-unit.source: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一笔贷款将来的值是 $0，因为最终付款之后，所以其值。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要保存你的孩子教育版大于 18 岁的 50000，则 50000 是将来的值。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, 0 is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，则假定为 0。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: Object of type <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"></xref> that specifies when payments are due.
trans-unit.target: 类型的对象<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"> </xref> ，指定何时付款。

trans-unit.source: This argument must be either `DueDate.EndOfPeriod` if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or `DueDate.BegOfPeriod` if payments are due at the beginning of the period.
trans-unit.target: 此参数必须是`DueDate.EndOfPeriod`如果付款的付款周期，末尾的到期时间或`DueDate.BegOfPeriod`如果在该期间开始付款的到期时间。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, `DueDate.EndOfPeriod` is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，`DueDate.EndOfPeriod`假定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the number of periods for an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>基于定期固定的付款和固定的利率指定年金的期间数。

trans-unit.source: Rate = 0 and Pmt = 0
trans-unit.target: Rate= 0 and Pmt = 0

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the net present value of an investment based on a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts) and a discount rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定投资的净现值基于一系列定期现金流量 （付款和收款） 和贴现率而定。

trans-unit.source: The net present value of an investment is the current value of a future series of payments and receipts.
trans-unit.target: 投资的净现值是未来的一系列付款和收款的当前值。

trans-unit.source: The `NPV` function uses the order of values within the array to interpret the order of payments and receipts.
trans-unit.target: `NPV`函数使用在该数组中的值的顺序来解释付款和收款的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to enter your payment and receipt values in the correct sequence.
trans-unit.target: 请确保以正确的顺序输入付款和回执值。

trans-unit.source: The `NPV` investment begins one period before the date of the first cash flow value and ends with the last cash flow value in the array.
trans-unit.target: `NPV`投资日期之前的第一个现金流量值的一个周期开始和结束的最后一个的现金流值数组中。

trans-unit.source: The net present value calculation is based on future cash flows.
trans-unit.target: Net 存在的值计算基于未来的现金流。

trans-unit.source: If your first cash flow occurs at the beginning of the first period, the first value must be added to the value returned by `NPV` and must not be included in the cash flow values of `ValueArray`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在第一个期间开始处出现第一个的现金流，第一个的值必须添加到返回的值`NPV`和中的现金流值不能包含`ValueArray`。

trans-unit.source: The `NPV` function is similar to the `PV` function (present value) except that the `PV` function allows cash flows to begin either at the end or the beginning of a period.
trans-unit.target: `NPV`函数是类似于`PV`函数 （现值） 但`PV`函数允许现金流开始在结束或句点开头。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the variable `NPV` cash flow values, `PV` cash flows must be fixed throughout the investment.
trans-unit.target: 与该变量不同`NPV`现金流量值`PV`现金流必须固定在整个投资。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying discount rate over the length of the period, expressed as a decimal.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定的期间长度贴现率，表示为十进制。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying cash flow values.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定现金流量值。

trans-unit.source: The array must contain at least one negative value (a payment) and one positive value (a receipt).
trans-unit.target: 该数组必须包含至少一个负值 （支出） 和一个正值 （接收）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the net present value of an investment based on a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts) and a discount rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定投资的净现值基于一系列定期现金流量 （付款和收款） 和贴现率而定。

trans-unit.source: ValueArray is , rank of ValueArray <> 1, or Rate = -1
trans-unit.target: ValueArrayis , rank of ValueArray <> 1, or Rate = -1

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the payment for an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>基于定期固定付款和固定的利率指定年金的付款。

trans-unit.source: An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made during a period of time.
trans-unit.target: 年金是一系列在一段时间内所做的固定数量现金付款。

trans-unit.source: An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan).
trans-unit.target: 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或 （如每月节省计划） 投资。

trans-unit.source: The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units.
trans-unit.target: `Rate`和`NPer`必须使用以相同的单位表示的付款周期计算自变量。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`Rate`使用月计算`NPer`还必须按月进行计算。

trans-unit.source: For all arguments, cash paid (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers.
trans-unit.target: （如存款） 付费的现金表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the interest rate per period.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定每个周期的利率。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你获得的汽车贷款年增长率百分比 (APR) 的 10%，并使每月付款，每个周期的速率为 0.1/12，即 0.0083。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定按年金的付款周期总数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 × 12 (or 48) payment periods.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你在四年的汽车贷款上进行每月付款，你的贷款了的 4 × 12 （即 48） 付款周期。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the present value (or lump sum) that a series of payments to be paid in the future is worth now.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定存在值 （或总计） 在将来支付的付款一系列值得现在。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当您贷款钱购买一辆汽车，贷款量是到您每月付款 lender 的现值。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying future value or cash balance you want after you have made the final payment.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定将来的值或你希望之后所做的最后一次付款的现金余额。

trans-unit.source: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一笔贷款将来的值是 $0，因为最终付款之后，所以其值。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to save $50,000 during 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要在你的孩子教育版 18 岁期间保存 50000，则 50000 是将来的值。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, 0 is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，则假定为 0。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: Object of type <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"></xref> that specifies when payments are due.
trans-unit.target: 类型的对象<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"> </xref> ，指定何时付款。

trans-unit.source: This argument must be either `DueDate.EndOfPeriod` if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or `DueDate.BegOfPeriod` if payments are due at the beginning of the period.
trans-unit.target: 此参数必须是`DueDate.EndOfPeriod`如果付款的付款周期，末尾的到期时间或`DueDate.BegOfPeriod`如果在该期间开始付款的到期时间。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, `DueDate.EndOfPeriod` is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，`DueDate.EndOfPeriod`假定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the payment for an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>基于定期固定付款和固定的利率指定年金的付款。

trans-unit.source: NPer = 0.
trans-unit.target: NPer = 0.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the principal payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>基于定期固定的付款和固定的利率指定年金的给定时间段内本金付款。

trans-unit.source: An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time.
trans-unit.target: 年金是一系列段一段时间内所做的固定数量现金付款。

trans-unit.source: An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan).
trans-unit.target: 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或 （如每月节省计划） 投资。

trans-unit.source: The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units.
trans-unit.target: `Rate`和`NPer`必须使用以相同的单位表示的付款周期计算自变量。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`Rate`使用月计算`NPer`还必须按月进行计算。

trans-unit.source: For all arguments, cash paid (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers.
trans-unit.target: （如存款） 付费的现金表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the interest rate per period.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定每个周期的利率。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你获得的汽车贷款年增长率百分比 (APR) 的 10%，并使每月付款，每个周期的速率为 0.1/12，即 0.0083。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the payment period in the range 1 through `NPer`.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定到 1 范围内的付款周期`NPer`。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定按年金的付款周期总数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你在四年的汽车贷款上进行每月付款，你的贷款了的 4 x 12 （即 48） 付款周期。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the current value of a series of future payments or receipts.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定的未来付款或收入一系列的当前值。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当您贷款钱购买一辆汽车，贷款量是到您每月付款 lender 的现值。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying future value or cash balance you want after you have made the final payment.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定将来的值或你希望之后所做的最后一次付款的现金余额。

trans-unit.source: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一笔贷款将来的值是 $0，因为最终付款之后，所以其值。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要保存你的孩子教育版大于 18 岁的 50000，则 50000 是将来的值。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, 0 is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，则假定为 0。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: Object of type <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"></xref> that specifies when payments are due.
trans-unit.target: 类型的对象<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"> </xref> ，指定何时付款。

trans-unit.source: This argument must be either `DueDate.EndOfPeriod` if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or `DueDate.BegOfPeriod` if payments are due at the beginning of the period.
trans-unit.target: 此参数必须是`DueDate.EndOfPeriod`如果付款的付款周期，末尾的到期时间或`DueDate.BegOfPeriod`如果在该期间开始付款的到期时间。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, `DueDate.EndOfPeriod` is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，`DueDate.EndOfPeriod`假定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the principal payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>基于定期固定的付款和固定的利率指定年金的给定时间段内本金付款。

trans-unit.source: Per <=0 or Per > NPer.
trans-unit.target: Per<=0 or Per > NPer.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the present value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments to be paid in the future and a fixed interest rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>基于定期固定付款将来付费和固定的利率指定年金的现值。

trans-unit.source: An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time.
trans-unit.target: 年金是一系列段一段时间内所做的固定数量现金付款。

trans-unit.source: An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan).
trans-unit.target: 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或 （如每月节省计划） 投资。

trans-unit.source: The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units.
trans-unit.target: `Rate`和`NPer`必须使用以相同的单位表示的付款周期计算自变量。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`Rate`使用月计算`NPer`还必须按月进行计算。

trans-unit.source: For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers.
trans-unit.target: （如存款） 中支付的现金表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the interest rate per period.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定每个周期的利率。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你获得的汽车贷款年增长率百分比 (APR) 的 10%，并使每月付款，每个周期的速率为 0.1/12，即 0.0083。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定按年金的付款周期总数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你在四年的汽车贷款上进行每月付款，你的贷款具有 4 x 12 （即 48） 期偿付。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the payment to be made each period.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定进行每个段内的付款。

trans-unit.source: Payments usually contain principal and interest that does not change during the life of the annuity.
trans-unit.target: 付款通常包含主体和利息年金的生命周期内不会更改。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the future value or cash balance you want after you make the final payment.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定你希望之后进行最后一次付款终值或现金余额。

trans-unit.source: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一笔贷款将来的值是 $0，因为最终付款之后，所以其值。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要保存你的孩子教育版大于 18 岁的 50000，则 50000 是将来的值。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, 0 is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，则假定为 0。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: Object of type <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"></xref> that specifies when payments are due.
trans-unit.target: 类型的对象<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"> </xref> ，指定何时付款。

trans-unit.source: This argument must be either `DueDate.EndOfPeriod` if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or `DueDate.BegOfPeriod` if payments are due at the beginning of the period.
trans-unit.target: 此参数必须是`DueDate.EndOfPeriod`如果付款的付款周期，末尾的到期时间或`DueDate.BegOfPeriod`如果在该期间开始付款的到期时间。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, `DueDate.EndOfPeriod` is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，`DueDate.EndOfPeriod`假定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the present value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments to be paid in the future and a fixed interest rate.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>基于定期固定付款将来付费和固定的利率指定年金的现值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the interest rate per period for an annuity.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定年金周期的利率。

trans-unit.source: An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time.
trans-unit.target: 年金是一系列段一段时间内所做的固定数量现金付款。

trans-unit.source: An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan).
trans-unit.target: 年金可以 （例如住房抵押） 贷款或 （如每月节省计划） 投资。

trans-unit.source: For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers.
trans-unit.target: （如存款） 中支付的现金表示为负数; 对于所有参数，表示正数表示 （如被除数检查） 收到的现金。

trans-unit.source: `Rate` is calculated by iteration.
trans-unit.target: `Rate`通过迭代计算。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the value of `Guess`, `Rate` cycles through the calculation until the result is accurate to within 0.00001 percent.
trans-unit.target: 从的值开始`Guess`，`Rate`进行计算，直到结果是精确到 0.00001%范围内的周期。

trans-unit.source: If `Rate` cannot find a result after 20 tries, it fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Rate`找不到 20 后的结果尝试，它将失败。

trans-unit.source: If your guess is 10 percent and `Rate` fails, try a different value for `Guess`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为 10%和`Rate`失败，请尝试不同的值`Guess`。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定按年金的付款周期总数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 * 12 (or 48) payment periods.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你在四年的汽车贷款上进行每月付款，你的贷款了的 4 * 12 （即 48） 付款周期。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the payment to be made each period.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定进行每个段内的付款。

trans-unit.source: Payments usually contain principal and interest that doesn't change over the life of the annuity.
trans-unit.target: 付款通常包含主体和利息，都不会更改年金的生命周期。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the present value, or value today, of a series of future payments or receipts.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定当前值，或当前，未来付款或收入一系列的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当您贷款钱购买一辆汽车，贷款量是到您每月付款 lender 的现值。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifies the future value or cash balance you want after you make the final payment.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定你希望之后进行最后一次付款终值或现金余额。

trans-unit.source: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一笔贷款将来的值是 $0，因为最终付款之后，所以其值。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要保存你的孩子教育版大于 18 岁的 50000，则 50000 是将来的值。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, 0 is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，则假定为 0。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: Object of type <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"></xref> that specifies when payments are due.
trans-unit.target: 类型的对象<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate"> </xref> ，指定何时付款。

trans-unit.source: This argument must be either `DueDate.EndOfPeriod` if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or `DueDate.BegOfPeriod` if payments are due at the beginning of the period.
trans-unit.target: 此参数必须是`DueDate.EndOfPeriod`如果付款的付款周期，末尾的到期时间或`DueDate.BegOfPeriod`如果在该期间开始付款的到期时间。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, `DueDate.EndOfPeriod` is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，`DueDate.EndOfPeriod`假定。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying value you estimate is returned by <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rate" name="Rate" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定你估计的值返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Rate" name="Rate" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, `Guess` is 0.1 (10 percent).
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，`Guess`为 0.1 （10%)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the interest rate per period for an annuity.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定年金周期的利率。

trans-unit.source: NPer <= 0.
trans-unit.target: NPer <= 0.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the straight-line depreciation of an asset for a single period.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定资产直线折旧一段时间内的。

trans-unit.source: The depreciation period must be expressed in the same unit as the `Life` argument.
trans-unit.target: 必须为相同的单位表示折旧期间`Life`自变量。

trans-unit.source: All arguments must be positive numbers.
trans-unit.target: 所有参数必须都是正数。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying initial cost of the asset.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定资产的初始的成本。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying value of the asset at the end of its useful life.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定在其使用年限末尾资产值。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying length of the useful life of the asset.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定资产的使用年限的长度。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the straight-line depreciation of an asset for a single period.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定资产直线折旧一段时间内的。

trans-unit.source: Life = 0.
trans-unit.target: Life = 0.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the sum-of-years digits depreciation of an asset for a specified period.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定资产的指定时间段内的总和的年限总额折旧。

trans-unit.source: The `Life` and `Period` arguments must be expressed in the same units.
trans-unit.target: `Life`和`Period`自变量必须以相同的单位表示。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `Life` is given in months, `Period` must also be given in months.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`Life`在月中，给定`Period`还必须为其提供在月中。

trans-unit.source: All arguments must be positive numbers.
trans-unit.target: 所有参数必须都是正数。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the initial cost of the asset.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定资产的初始成本。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the value of the asset at the end of its useful life.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定在其使用年限末尾资产的值。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the length of the useful life of the asset.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定资产的使用年限的长度。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the period for which asset depreciation is calculated.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定计算资产折旧的时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref> specifying the sum-of-years digits depreciation of an asset for a specified period.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Double" name="Double" href=""></xref>指定资产的指定时间段内的总和的年限总额折旧。

trans-unit.source: Salvage < 0, Period > Life, or Period <=0.
trans-unit.target: Salvage< 0, Period > Life, or Period <=0.
